author: Chris Hughes
content:
Practically a Mancunian institute and you should eat here at least once in your life if you live in the city.  It won't be the best curry you've ever had, or the most grandiose place you've ever eaten but you will get great tasting food at a great price.  Serving since 1984 and there is a reason they've been open for over 30 years

Menu choices vary depending on day of the week, good vegetarian options.
